CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 30, 1962, pg. 21 reads: "'Citizen' Wilson's Boys - Repreesnting [sic] the Charles C. Wilson colors, in Pony League, is this array of 1961 co-champions. Left to right, front row: Reggie Ward, Theodore Brooks, Wayne Ringgold, Willie Young and Ronald Colman.  Second row: Richard Palmer, David Brown, Richard Brooks, Manager Claude Williams, Edward Maloney, Arthur Bratton and Kenneth Kind.  Manager Williams is from the Fifth Ward, and also serves as an 18th District committeeman. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Charles C. Wilson baseball team, front row from left: Reggie Ward, Theodore Brooks, Wayne Ringgold, Willie Young, Ronald Colman; second row: Richard Palmer, David Brown, Richard Brooks, Manager Claude Williams, Edward Maloney, Arthur Bratton, and Kenneth Kind, posed on grandstand at Kennard Field
